components.name: Ethylene Vinyl Acetate Copolymer
components.notes: Vinyl acetate copolymer is a commonly used polymer modifier for cementitious products.  Specific products may contain similar polymers instead, or in addition to, this example.

environmental.systemBoundary: The system boundary includes all cradle-to-gate data, including raw materials extraction, transportation of ingredients to the sub-floor smoothing compound mixing plant, and plant operations. Transportation data taken from Athena (2014) report/survey. Mixing energy taken from Athena (1998).

gabiDatasets.name: EU-27: Magnesium carbonate (MgCO3,  fine,  washed for fillers)
US: Calcium hydroxide (Ca(OH)2, dry, slaked lime)
NL: Vinyl acetate (acetic acid vinyl ester, VAM)

environmental.endOfLifeTreatment: 55% of the smoothing compound assumed to be recycled, with the remaining 45% going to landfill.

name: Sub-Floor Smoothing Compound
description: Subfloor smoothing compounds, or underlayments, are a thinned mix of cements, sand, and water.  The mix is poured over slabs and other subfloors and spread across the floor.  It naturally collects in low spots, resulting in a level and smooth subfloor once it has hardened.
